company_description: Ledger is a cryptocurrency hardware wallet manufacturer that provides secure storage solutions for storing and managing digital assets, offering hardware wallets and cryptocurrency management software.
founders: Eric Larchevêque, Joel Pobeda, Nicolas Bacca, Thomas France
universities: SUPINFO, Stanford, Ecole Nationals de Ponts et Chaussees, ESIEE Paris, Paris-Sorbonne
embedding_text: Ledger is a cryptocurrency hardware wallet manufacturer that provides secure storage solutions for storing and managing digital assets, offering hardware wallets and cryptocurrency management software.
